channel.title: New owner of fagex.net is a scammer!
channel.description:
This forum has benn temporarily CLOSED by Rogue. It will re-open soon. For more info contact rogue@jaghax.com (MSN) This is an email you should have recieved: Subject: Firefly + Blueflames = Scammers Message: They bought fagex just to scam. They scammed a number of people and we have proof. It all started when firefly bought fagex, he told most staff right away he was seaslash, but his ways has changed. He was seaslash, seaslash was an old scammer. He made BlueFlames head admin out of nowhere. He used to be Josh Vasco, and he got banned for scamming. They scammed, put Fagex down. I came online and went into a conversation with a shitload of people, all telling me stuff. I put the board back online, and we banned Firefly and Blueflames. We have Rogue making copies of the database and everything. Do not worry, everything should be back to normal soon enough, we might not have the domain fagex.net, but something similar. Expect to hear more. - Fagex staff
I'm also really mad because that prick scammed me of $60. So uh yeah, the good thing is that I have his address :)

item.title: New owner of fagex.net is a scammer!
item.dc:creator: @yna_ajhear5 yna_ajhear5
item.description:
@yna_ajhear5 wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:32, topic:3229”][quote author=Arkanor link=topic=3754.msg37230#msg37230 date=1148524932]

[quote author=yna_ajhear5 link=topic=3754.msg37048#msg37048 date=1148500026]lol. You think I’m stupid? I know alot of shit you haven’t even heard of.
[/quote]

I don’t think you’re stupid anymore. Now I know. Kthx.

At times I can almost understand why Xerxes is the way he is.
[/quote]

Arkanor is right though Yna, normally I’d agree with you but you came off a little… Umm… Bleh I can’t think of the word.[/quote]

A little bit of an asshole? I know thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: New owner of fagex.net is a scammer!
item.dc:creator: @yna_ajhear5 yna_ajhear5
item.description:
@yna_ajhear5 wrote:

the new fagex is at this…

Jagex

We Are Jagex

Publisher of RuneScape and the Home of Living Games


Code:
Jagex

We Are Jagex

Publisher of RuneScape and the Home of Living Games

made by humble and bego

Velocity wrote:
Horray i’m fucking home with my sources. Well now I can all tell you the Story of yesterdays “Staff Convo”

It all started yesterday afternoon when Ghost showed me this topic (which was soon DELETED, not MOVED like Firefly said). This shows Firefly and Blueflames being revealed.

Image

I then dicussed it with a few other staff members and we werent sure what to do. So I then added everyone that was on my Staff msn contact list into 1 converstaion. Then 1 by 1 we eventrually had pretty much all the staff in one big converstation.

At first it was just fucking Havoc. People accusing this and saying that without any proof. Then we got kozmo added and he said that Seaslash never paid him for having him train his acount (See pic at bottem). We all then just discussed what was going on. Soon after Fireflies story was released he shut down the forums, Why? Well lets see.

Maybe

  1. To stop this from being spread by post
  2. Stop this from being spread by pm
  3. Try and slow down everyone knowing about what he did/plans to do

Well we see we’re fucked for the moment. Firefly did shut down the forums so our only hope was having someone get into the Cpanel and bring them back up. That person, was bego. Now Firefly was too stupid to de-admin Bego and Blizzind. So When bego got online (Alteast an hour after the chat had started ((FFS BEGO! Lol)) ) he brought the forums back up. He admined Humble and he annouced what was going on. We first Banned Firefly and Blueflames then preceeded to get him away from the database. Who was this master in disguise? It was Rouge. I’m not quite sure how he had access to the database but fucking glory he did. After Firefly brought the forums back and got banned again Rouge took his privaledges off the hosting for a bit (or something like that). So now we have full access to the forums! HORRAY! We quickly made a database backup (since Juans was a bit outdated) and then discussed a new name for the forums. Things settled down a bit at this point and we were all mellow and stuff so I left. I watched a movie and came back and found out we’d decided that the forums were going to be relocated at: www. Fagex Under ground .net – stupid filter >.<

Why fagex? 1. FagexReloaded.net sounded lame. 2. Firefly has copyright to Fagex.net 3. Fagex.Com was already made by Firefly for scamming.

Image

Now a note to anyone who stays:

Goodluck, beware, have a goodtime. I’ve decided to leave all this behinde me and move on to a place where I can remorese and have fun. Someday i’ll look back and say “Damn… I was there”

Thanks.

Oh, sicne i’m leaving my offcial <3 list type thing

Crypt- Too good a friend to describe. I beleive he’s mad at me now for being part of what happened lsat night
Whisper- See you at the fagex
Bego- Just met you but your hella cool, thanks for helpig us out
Sorry, I could only really mention them. They’re my big time friends here at Fagex, so yea. Sorry to everyone NOT listed

the new fagex is at this…

Jagex

We Are Jagex

Publisher of RuneScape and the Home of Living Games


Code:
http://www.fagex.net/[br][size=1]Posted at: May 24, 2006, 06:10:14 pm[/size][hr]actully it’s www.fagexunderground.net sry

Read full topic

item.title: New owner of fagex.net is a scammer!
item.dc:creator: @yna_ajhear5 yna_ajhear5
item.description:
@yna_ajhear5 wrote:

[quote=“Arkanor, post:23, topic:3229”][quote author=yna_ajhear5 link=topic=3754.msg36907#msg36907 date=1148471076]
And you are calling me an Aryan n00b when I only used it for a week and how can they be “unconnected with RS cheating” when That’s really the only placce that is still active, besides here.

Watch your mouth.
[/quote]

I didn’t call you an Aryan n00b. I said ‘most of their members’. Why are you so defensive all of a sudden? Unless, of course, you have inner doubts. Also, I noted that a lot of their memberbase probably doesn’t even cheat in RS. I said nothing about some of the board staff or a minority of members.

And I don’t suppose you have heard of SRL, because that’s where hard-core SCAR scripting goes on. [/quote]

lol. You think I’m stupid? I know alot of shit you haven’t even heard of.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @yna_ajhear5 yna_ajhear5
item.description:
@yna_ajhear5 wrote:

Arkanor:

Fagex sucks. Any community that has multiple porn boards doesn’t rank too high in my estimation - FFS they were supposed to be a cheating community, not a cracking/sharez/warez/pr0n community. Most of their members, I suspect, are Aryan n00bs or people totally unconnected with RS cheating.

There not supposed to be just a cheating community. It’s specifically says it’s for Warez & RS.

And you are calling me an Aryan n00b when I only used it for a week and how can they be “unconnected with RS cheating” when That’s really the only placce that is still active, besides here.

Watch your mouth.
